alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Fayette; Franklin; Ripley; Union; Wayne (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 4:12AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF FRANKLIN COUNTY, WAYNE COUNTY, NORTHEASTERN RIPLEY COUNTY, UNION COUNTY, NORTHERN DEARBORN COUNTY AND FAYETTE COUNTY THROUGH 445 AM EDT... At 410 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Dublin to Batesville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Richmond, Connersville, Harrison, Batesville, Brookville, Centerville, Cambridge City, Bright, Hidden Valley, Liberty, Hagerstown, Fountain City, Dublin, West College Corner, Oldenburg, Glenwood, Lake Santee, Guilford, Franklin and Salem. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 134 and 156. I-74 in Indiana between mile markers 145 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Dearborn; Fayette; Franklin; Ripley; Union; Wayne
